Package restaurant

Class Order

java.lang.Object
restaurant.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Order>, MenuList
public class Order extends Object implements MenuList, Comparable<Order>
The Order class is a record of a collection of menu items made by customers.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order​(Reservation reservation, Staff staff)
      Construct an order from a reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservation - The reservation from which the order will be created. Can not be null.
      staff - The staff who created the order.

    • Order

      public Order​(Reservation reservation, double totalPrice)
      Construct an order from database.
      Parameters:
      reservation - The reservation from which the order will be created. Can not be null.
      totalPrice - The recorded totalPrice of this bill.

    • getItemIndex

      public int getItemIndex​(int itemCode)
      Search ordered items given an item code. Returns the index in the order if exists and -1 otherwise.
      Parameters:
      itemCode - The item code to search for.
      Returns:
      The index in the order if exists and -1 otherwise.

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the information of the order to standard output in a user-friendly way.

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice​(boolean isMember)
      Prints an invoice of the order to standard output in a user-friendly way and set the order to inactive.
      Parameters:
      isMember - boolean to check if an order is paid by a member of the restaurant and the discount applied if isMember is true

    • updateTime

      Change the starting time of the reservation to now.

    • contains

      public MenuItem contains​(MenuItem mi)
      Search child components given a component. Returns the identical component in the menu if exists and null otherwise.
      Specified by:
      contains in interface MenuList
      Parameters:
      mi - The component to search for.
      Returns:
      The identical component in the menu if exists and null otherwise.

    • getReservation

      public Reservation getReservation()
      Get the reservation attached to an order
      Returns:
      the reservation assiocated with an order. Every order has to be instantiated from a reservation regardless of whether the reservation is made by a customer or not. Hence null is never returned.

    • getTime

      public LocalDateTime getTime()
      Get the time of an order
      Returns:
      Returns the order creation time

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Order o2)
      Self-defined rule for order comparison according to the reservations attached to the order. Two Order instances are considered equal if they refer to the same reservation(reference).
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Order>

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object o)
      Self-defined rule for order comparison according to which table this order belongs to
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Returns:
      true if the two Order object are made on the same table, false otherwise
